mapper.select: select idx, memberid, pwd, name, email, phone, addr1, addr2, post , '(우)'|| post ||' '|| addr1 ||' '|| addr2 AS address , substr(birth,1,4) ||'년'|| substr(birth,5,2) ||'월'|| substr(birth,7,2) ||'일' AS birth , extract(year from sysdate) - substr(birth,1,4) + 1 AS age , case gender when 0 then '남' else '여' end AS gender , to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS regDate , to_char(lastdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS lastDate , to_char(pwdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS pwDate , case status when 0 then '활동' when 1 then '휴면' when 2 then '정지' when 3 then '탈퇴' else '' end AS status from member where idx = #{idx}
